articles.author: Sakshi Tiwari
articles.title: British SAS, UK’s Elite Special Air Service Forces Could Be Operating Inside Ukraine To Battle Russia – Leaked US Intel - EurAsian Times
articles.description: Among a host of information about the Ukraine war made available by the controversial leak of Pentagon documents, there is a revelation that British special troops have been stationed in Ukraine. The leaked files have revealed that up to 50 Special Forces, mo…
articles.content:
